author: Phil
content:
Checked last week, no word on swimmer from Japan to San Francisco.
Was he tangled in trash or eaten?

author: Phil
content: I was in Angola and S. Africa, trash in plastic shopping bags all along the roads once out of the cities. Terrible to see!

author: Al por
content: There is also a problem with all those balloons filled with helium. A lot of thepapaporcem make it out over the ocean before they deflate.
